item.title: Getting Started
item.description: RStreams flow is powered by the popular Serverless Framework. It has a very large community and many plugins that provide a scaffold for RStreams Flow to build on. The Serverless Framework does have some deficiencies, however, it is believed that it is extensible enough that these can be improved or worked around. Summary Get up an running to develop with RStreams with the sample app in less than 30 minutes.
